```{r}
#Access to the dataset
library(p8105.datasets)
data("ny_noaa")
```

```{r}
#clean the dataset
data_ny = ny_noaa %>%
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  drop_na(tmin,tmax,date)|>
  mutate(
    year = year(date),
    month = month(date, label = TRUE),
    day = day(date),
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,   
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10,
    prcp = prcp / 10,               
    snow = as.numeric(snow)        
  ) 

```
```{r}
snowfall= data_ny %>%
  filter(!is.na(snow)) %>%
  count(snow)%>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```
